com.nexmo.clientcore.network.socket

Class SocketManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nexmo.clientcore.network.socket.SocketManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISocketManager

    public class SocketManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISocketManager
    Created by ibendayan on 31/03/2018. This class manage the state of the Socket's request and passes them to the SocketRouter.
